description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF TENDER - NO. CB-6180-87811678

### Notice Type:
*Request for Proposal, Competitive - Open bidding*

### Details:
The *Directorate Maritime Procurement* is issuing this request for the procurement of safety relief valves. The requirement includes:

#### Item 1:
*Description:* VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF, Part No.: YB2385E224, NCAGE: 35795
*Quantity:* 10 units, Unit of Issue: EA
*Delivery Location:* CFB Esquimalt

#### Item 2:
*Description:* VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF, Part No.: YB2385E224, NCAGE: 35795
*Quantity:* 10 units, Unit of Issue: EA
*Delivery Location:* CFB Halifax

### Important Details:
* The Canadian Content Act respects Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA)
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids in foreign currency will not be considered
* Suppliers may negotiate with the Crown on procurement details

### Proposal Submission:
Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
Bid submissions must include the proposed prices for the requested items

### Contact Information:
Jean-Pierre Normandin (jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (819) 939-3674

### Notice Information:
* Reference Number: CB-6180-87811678
* Solicitation Number: W8482-241709/A
* Publication Date: 2023-06-08
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-17T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-07-04
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-31
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-03-29

### Trade Agreements:
* The procurement falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity:
* Unspecified region(s)
* Canada (various regions)

### Regions of Delivery:
* Nova Scotia
* Canada
* British Columbia
